title: Overseas travel
rule 1: Australian Government advice for travellers and visitors.

title: Queensland international arrivals registration
rule 2: You must apply for and receive a Queensland International Arrivals Registration before entering Queensland from overseas.

title: Travel to Queensland — border restrictions
rule 3: To slow the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19), the Queensland Government has restricted entry into Queensland. Read more about entry requirements, exemptions and passes.

title: Travelling from Queensland
rule 4: If you’re travelling from Queensland it’s important to understand what restrictions apply to domestic travel. Find helpful information on what you need to do to travel into other states and territories, including applying for border passes.
